Title: Sr. Cyber Fraud Data Scientist
JD:
About the job
    


          At PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL), we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy. Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone, regardless of background or economic standing, has access to affordable, convenient, and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives.
Job Description Summary:
Global Investigations is looking for a highly talented, self-motivated, and analytical individual to join the Cyber Fraud Investigations Team. The mission of the Cyber Fraud Investigations Team (CFI) is to ensure the financial and reputational resiliency of PayPal and its subsidiaries through the resolution of complex investigations into incidents of fraud. This role provides the opportunity to work alongside leading investigations professionals in collaboration with law enforcement, private sector partners, and a broad array of internal stakeholders. You will research and deploy cutting edge investigative strategies to stop the most sophisticated fraud actors targeting PayPal and adjacent businesses.
Job Description:
The Sr. Cyber Fraud Data Scientist will identify complex fraud patterns and their technical root causes through detailed data mining and analysis. Your research will seek to connect seemingly disparate fraud trends that are perpetrated by sophisticated threat groups and track them across the enterprise. This work supports Risk and Platforms by providing investigative insights that enhance fraud risk controls, recovering funds from networks of bad actors, and deterring fraud by referring matters to law enforcement.
Your day to day will include:
Joining data between platforms to track disparate fraud signals and develop a holistic view of fraud trends across PayPal’s adjacencies.Researching new components for integration into CFI’s advanced linking framework that identifies fraud actors across the enterprise; providing technical guidance for engineering projects that incorporate new data points into the investigative team’s toolkit.Expanding upon investigative fraud stories by developing statistics and data visualizations to quantify and broadly assess the impact of common root causes on the platform.Serving as technical SME for CFI by sharing new data mining techniques, maintaining technical reference documentation, and interfacing with partner technology teams.Collaborating across business and technology stakeholders to communicate analytic findings succinctly to both technical and non-technical audiences.


What do you need to bring:
Successful track record of owning and driving large, complex data analysis projects.Advanced understanding of financially motivated cybercrime trends and typologies.Demonstrated capacity for innovation and outside-the-box thinking in the creation of new capabilities and processes that are unstructured or exploratory in nature.Team player, energetic personality, curious, quality minded, focused, committed, able to work efficiently in a fast paced, changing environment.Advanced SQL knowledge and proficient in one or more major programming languages (SAS, R, Matlab, Python, Java, Perl, etc.)


Our Benefits:
At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
Who We Are:
To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
PayPal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution for more than 20 years. By leveraging technology to make financial services and commerce more convenient, affordable, and secure, the PayPal platform is empowering more than 400 million consumers and merchants in more than 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy. For more information, visit paypal.com.
